name: Zeus Fever
description:
Gods might have messed up when they took Zeus guarding Olympos for granted. Zeus gets a divine cold (not common) and no one is defending the mountain!

Gather mana and coins from match-3 and use them to build and power your shrines in tower defense. Don't let bouncy cyclops reach the end or Zeus will be really upset!

Made for Ludum Dare 41 in 3 days.
by
Ret (@ret44)

Estefanía R-C. A. (@zotapianola)

Anıl Demir (@nettleflap)
